text: Vijaykumar Gavit is a leader of Bharatiya Janata Party and a member of Maharashtra Legislative Assembly from Nandurbar. Vijaykumar Gavit welcomed to the party fold by Leader of Opposition in the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Eknath Khadse on 6 September 2014.http://www.ndtv.com/india-news/former- maharashtra-ncp-minister-vijaykumar-gavit-joins-bjp-660069 ==Political career== Vijaykumar Gavit take oath in the new government has 18 ministers from the Congress and 20 from NCP, including Deputy Chief Minister Chhagan Bhujbal on 7 November 2009.http://www.daijiworld.com/news/news_disp.asp?n_id=67993 ===Positions held=== ====Within BJP==== ====Legislative==== * *Member, Maharashtra Legislative Assembly - Since 1995http://www.elections.in/maharashtra/assembly- constituencies/nandurbar.html * Minister of state (Maharashtra) of Health and Family Welfare : 1995–1999. * Minister of state (Maharashtra) of Tribal Affairs: 1999–2004. * Cabinet Minister of Maharashtra (Minister of Tribal Affairs): 2004–2009. * Cabinet Minister of Maharashtra (Minister of Medical Education and Food Production): 2009-2014 ==References== Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2004–2009 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Nandurbar district Category:Marathi politicians Category:Nationalist Congress Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:State cabinet ministers of Maharashtra Category:Maharashtra MLAs 1999–2004 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 1995–1999 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019– Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Vijaykumar Krishnarao Gavit
